text: The Kansas City Public Library is a public library system in the Central Library in Kansas City, Missouri."Contact us." Kansas City Public Library. Retrieved on January 20, 2011. "The Kansas City Public Library 14 West 10th Street Kansas City, MO 64105.""Hours & locations." Kansas City Public Library. Retrieved on January 20, 2011. "Central Library 14 West 10th Street Kansas City, MO 64105." It was created on December 5, 1873. ==References== Category:Libraries in the United States Category:Kansas City, Missouri Category:1873 establishments in the United States
